original_text: It shall not be quenched night nor day; the smoke thereof shall go up for ever: from generation to generation it shall lie waste; none shall pass through it for ever and ever.
korean_text: 낮에나 밤에나 꺼지지 아니하고 그 연기가 끊임없이 떠오를 것이며 세세에 황무하여 그리로 지날 자가 영영히 없겠고

sentences.original_text: It shall not be quenched night nor day
smoke thereof shall go up for ever
from generation to generation it shall lie waste
none shall pass through it for ever and ever
